title: Texas Democrats flee state to block Trump‑backed redistricting vote in dramatic legislative move
description: Texas GOP shoots their shot with redistricting power play — and Jasmine Crockett is fuming.

title: 'Now I love her ad': Trump comments on Sydney Sweeney campaign after GOP revelation
description: The former president praised Sydney Sweeney’s campaign ad after learning she is a registered Republican.

title: 'The View' co‑host criticizes Kamala Harris' post‑campaign interview with Colbert
description: A co‑host of The View argued that Vice President Kamala Harris didn’t adequately address concerns in her appearance on The Late Show.
